nodes.text: A Palawa tunic was a form-fitting tunic worn by the Followers of Palawa on the planet Bunduki. The Pike Sisters, having studied on Bunduki, wore the tunics of their Palawa teachers in their careers as professional fighters, as the tunic allowed them freedom of movement. Arden Lyn, a Steel Hand of Palawa active during the Galactic Republic's earliest days, was likewise known to have worn a Palawa tunic.
